    Professional Journey

    Digital Transformation & AI Product Consultant

    Oct 2022 - Present

    Leading innovative AI solutions development with multiple product generations:

    • Gen 4 (Dec 2024): Multi-Agent Architecture System
      Advanced distributed AI system with multiple specialized agents
    • Gen 3 (Jul 2024): Distributed Learning Framework
      Lightweight model architecture with distributed inference capabilities
    • Gen 2 (Dec 2023): Advanced Agent Platform
      Multimodal integration with Canvas support and enhanced tooling
    • Gen 1 (Jun 2023): AIGC Platform
      Integration of ChatGPT-3.5 and Midjourney for marketing automation

    Chief Data Officer

    2021 - 2022

    Led data strategy and digital transformation at Ziel (China Shenzhen Listed), a major e-commerce enterprise.

    • Digital Transformation
      Spearheaded end-to-end business process rebuild and modernization
    • Data Experience Platform
      Architected ML-powered platform for automated e-commerce operations
    • Supply Chain Optimization
      Implemented predictive analytics for inventory and logistics optimization

    Chief Information Officer

    2014 - 2021

    Led digital strategy at Royole (Unicorn), pioneer of the world's first flexible display and foldable smartphone.

    • Manufacturing Digitalization
      Designed and implemented intelligent automated manufacturing systems for flexible display production
    • End-to-End Digital Transformation
      Orchestrated digital integration across manufacturing, supply chain, and marketplace operations
    • Data Infrastructure
      Established enterprise data warehouse and cross-functional BI systems

    Featured Case Study

    isAssistant Platform

    AI-Powered Enterprise Assistant Platform

    Reliable Response System

    • Comprehensive capability assessment for each request
    • Context-aware response generation
    • Short-term and long-term memory management
    • Automatic human handoff for low-confidence scenarios
    • Continuous learning from human responses

    Flexible Node Architecture

    • Multiple node types (Agent, Tool, Chain nodes)
    • Dynamic role-based nodes (Planning, Routing, Context)
    • Hot-pluggable capability-based node discovery
    • Advanced workflow management
    • Multi-graph architecture with sub-graph orchestration

    Comprehensive Service Integration

    • Multi-modal AI services (OpenAI, Claude, Llama, Qwen)
    • Vector stores and graph services (Neo4j, Qdrant, Milvus)
    • Browser automation and video processing
    • Voice UI and adaptive agent framework
    • Multi-channel communication (WeChat, WhatsApp, Email)

    Advanced AI Capabilities

    • Automated data collection and labeling
    • User segmentation and topic analysis
    • Predictive user needs analysis
    • Dynamic response optimization
    • Automated workflow orchestration
